Let's start!

Easy To Use DanChat App

Features:
  1. Registration of new users, authorization, authorization by token
  2. Message delivery along the path client1-server-client2, if client2 is online. The message is also written to the database.
  3. Status of message delivery to the server, autoscroll
TODO:

  2. Phone adaptation
  3. Status of delivery message to the client
  4. Preview of the last message in the cards
  5. Division into friends and other users
